--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Hydras/Shuttle/Perceptor:
> 
> The shuttle landed and the door oppened, outside was Perceptor 
> waitting to the new comer and his captors
> 
> Hydras stood up and said "Myrmidon and Trelos, follow Perceptor, he 
> will show you where our party will be and will help him to prepare 
> our guest; Jhiaxus, I'll guide your pals to CR, also we have a lil 
> thing to discuss before our private party..."and looking to Rodimus 
> said devilish"We meet us in a while, old pal, we will have some 
> funwith you before your ultimate fate"

Myrmidon half shrugged as he stepped out of the shuttle and turned to
follow Perceptor. If this was going to be a torture session then
Myrmidon knew he would be bored. Battle was fun, blade against balde,
cannon against cannon. The injuring of an already beaten captive held
little joy. However he still continued to follow Perceptor.

--------------------------------

Meanwhile the cloaked figure that was once a jet still maintained its
silent vigil. Assuming a robot mode it had slid inside just after the
shuttle did and held itself against a rear wall out of sight.

With a small movement it pulled off a small egg shaped object and threw
it. Whisper silent the pod flipped end over end and with the softest of
clicks attached itself to a wall. Immidietly legs sproutted out from it
as a head emerged giving it a spider-like look. 

Quickly it scuttled along the wall to the cieling, taking itself out
easy view. With amazing dexterity and speed the creature followed Hot
Rod and the group that escorted him moving further inside the base as
its master waited by the exit.

Preston
